entries.title: Bob Marley's grandson, Joseph 'Jo Mersa' Marley, dies aged 31
entries.description: Bob Marley's grandson, Joseph 'Jo Mersa' Marley, has died aged 31.

entries.title: 'Not enough beds': Doctors describe chaos in hospitals as COVID sweeps across China
entries.description: Doctors in China have described the chaos unfolding within hospitals as COVID-19 infections sweep the country.

entries.title: Pope Francis asks for prayers for his predecessor Pope Benedict and says he is 'very sick'
entries.description: Pope Francis has asked for prayers for his predecessor Pope Benedict saying the former head of the Catholic Church is "very sick".

entries.title: COVID patients no longer have to quarantine in Hong Kong as restrictions are lifted
entries.description: People who test positive for coronavirus will no longer have to quarantine in Hong Kong as part of a lifting of restrictions, the Chinese territory's leader has said.

entries.title: Two teenage boys charged with murder of British mother-of-two in Australia
entries.description: Two teenage boys have been charged with the murder of a British mother-of-two who was killed while defending her home in Australia on Boxing Day.
